sys_rest_message_fn.content: { "ROW_STATUS": null, "COURTCASE_PK": ${CourtCaseID}, "CASE_NAME": "${CaseName}", "OFFICIAL_CASE_NO": "${CaseNumber}", "COURT_NAME": "${CourtName}", "COURT_ROOM_NO": null, "COURT_TYPE": null, "TRIAL_JUDGE": null, "CONSENT_B": null, "LEIN_B": null, "DECLARATORY_JUDGEMENT_B": null, "FILED_DATE": null, "DEMAND_DATE": null, "TRIAL_STATUS_CODE": null, "TRIAL_STATUS_DATE": null, "DEFENSE_RESPONSE_DATE": null, "TRIAL_RESULT": null, "TRIAL_RESULT_DATE": null, "ORIG_TRIAL_DATE": null, "CURRENT_TRIAL_DATE": "${CurrentTrialDate}", "DEMAND_AMT": ${DemandAmount}, "INTEREST_AMT": 0, "PUNITIVE_DAMAGE_AWARD": 0, "COMPENSATORY_AWARD_AMT": 0, "VERDICT_AMT": 0, "REMITTITUR_AMT": 0, "SETTLEMENT_AMT": 0, "SOURCE_RECORD_FK": ${ClaimID}, "VENUE_STATE": "${VenueState}", "COMMITTEE_REVIEW_DATE": null, "COMMITTEE_DECISION": null, "VERDICT_DATE": null, "VENUE_CITY": null, "SOURCE_TABLE_NAME": "CLAIM", "REVIEWER_DATE": null, "REVIEWER_COMMENTS": null, "TRIAL_TYPE": null, "REPL_CLM_LIST": null, "REPL_INS_MISS": null, "REPL_CLM_LIST_XML": null, "ENTITY_COURT_FK": 0, "REGISTERED_B": null, "PUNITIVE_DAMAGE_AMT": 0, "CMS_AWARD_DATE": null, "CMS_AWARD_AMT": null, "CMS_ANNUITY_AMT": null, "SERVICE_METHOD": null, "SERVED_DATE": "${ServedDate}", "CHAR1": null, "CHAR2": null, "CHAR3": null, "CHAR4": null, "CHAR5": null, "ENTITY_JUDGE_FK": 0 }
